data.eml:eml: A new species of Liriomyza Mik (Diptera, Agromyzidae) on okra in Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sousa, Viviane Rodrigues De, Couri, Márcia Souto (2018): A new species of Liriomyza Mik (Diptera, Agromyzidae) on okra in Brazil. Zootaxa 4410 (3): 551-558, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4410.3.8
